text: The Runaways is a 2010 biographical movie. Dakota Fanning plays Cherie Currie. Kristen Stewart plays the singer Joan Jett. This movie is about the 1970s all- girl rock group called The Runaways. It begins around 1975. The Runaways got mostly positive review by critics. It was released on March 19, 2010. Category:2010s biographical movies Category:2010 movies Category:American independent movies Category:Movies about singers
title: The Runaways (movie)
